name: Controls naming convention - prefix, case and character set control
description:
Names of Controls should respect naming conventions (btn* for buttons, chk* for check boxes, cmb* for combo boxes,)  and should not include any underscore. 
The list of Controls can be updated by editing the quality rule Stored Procedure.
output:
This report lists all Controls violating naming conventions (btn* for buttons, chk* for check boxes, cmb* for combo boxes, ) or having an underscore.
It provides the following information:  Control name, Control full name
rationale: For readability aspects, naming conventions must be respected
remediation: Change name according to the naming convention
